title: Scrambled eggs with smoked salmon and dill
ingredients: ['6 eggs', '3 tbsp semi-skimmed milk', '6 plum tomatoes, halved lengthways', '4 thick slices wholemeal bread', '3 tbsp crème fraîche', '75 g (2½ oz) sliced smoked salmon, cut into thin strips', '1 tsp lemon juice', '1 tbsp chopped fresh dill', 'Salt and black pepper', 'sprigs of fresh dill to garnish']
